products.title: Genesis Black Roller Blind
products.description: The genesis black roller blind makes the perfect finishing touch to a modern, monochrome scheme. The practical roller design with its sleek lines and black fabric looks smart and stands out against white for an overall effect that is eye-catching yet minimalist. The lightweight dimout fabric creates a stylish window covering that offers privacy when required without dominating your space. products.title: Genesis Blackout Black Roller Blind
products.description: Give definition to your room design with the bold black finish of this genesis blackout black roller blind. This simple solution for dressing any window will have maximum effect thanks to the striking dark colour and impressive blackout function. The blackout fabric is ideal for blocking out light, keeping in warmth and aiding in easy sleeping. products.title: Genesis Black Perfect Fit Roller Blind
products.description: Their genesis range comes in 6 colour variations and is the perfect choice for a modern look. This crisp perfect fit black roller blind will look great in any room in your home and will add a touch of style. The perfect fit aspect of this blind means it can clip straight on to pvc window frames - saving space and meaning no drills or screws.
